text:
[Verse]
Morning sun peeks in
Cup of joy begins
Warm aroma fills
Heart with gentle thrills

[Verse]
Barista knows my name
Every day the same
Latte art complete
Life is bittersweet

[Chorus]
Coffee shop dreams
In the air it seems
Sip by sip we feel
Moments so unreal

[Verse]
People come and go
In a steady flow
Stories left untold
In this little hold

[Bridge]
Tables tucked away
Quiet place to stay
Thoughts start wandering free
In this symphony

[Chorus]
Coffee shop dreams
In the air it seems
Sip by sip we feel
Moments so unreal
title: The Coffee Shop
